attributes.action: provide street parties in every major city in the United Kingdom upon the death of Margaret Thatcher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister is requested to organize parties in every major city in the United Kingdom upon the death of Margaret Thatcher. Onee of the main refreshments offered at these parties must be fresh milk, preferably in little mini bottles, similar in size to the ones we used to drink during breaks in primary school. This of course was before school milk was taken away by 'someone'

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
